tool_description: Maintains detailed chain of custody records for sample handling, transfers, and location changes to ensure integrity and legal compliance.

action_type.description: Type of custody action: COLLECT, TRANSFER, RECEIVE, STORE, PROCESS, DISPOSE

staff_id.description: ID of staff member performing the action

witness_id.description: ID of witnessing staff member if required

error_messages: Sample not found: sample_barcode does not exist in the system.
Invalid action type: Use one of [COLLECT, TRANSFER, RECEIVE, STORE, PROCESS, DISPOSE].
Unauthorized staff: staff_id is not authorized for this action type.
Invalid location: Specified location is not recognized in the system.
Missing destination: destination is required for TRANSFER actions.
Chain of custody violation: Action violates established custody protocols.
Invalid witness: witness_id is required for this action type but not provided or invalid.
usage: Record each custody action by providing sample_barcode, action_type, staff_id, and location. Include destination for transfers and witness_id when required for high-security samples.

custody_record_id.description: Unique identifier for this custody record

timestamp.description: When the custody action was recorded

custody_status.description: Current custody status of the sample

chain_integrity.description: Whether chain of custody remains intact
